proposal intended to incite a panicked response to a phony crisis,'' Bill Lockyer , a Democrat, said during a conference call with reporters organized by the Economic Policy Institute, a Washington, D.C., think tank. Killer bees, space aliens... now it's the invasion of the bankrupt states. The truth is, no state wants to declare bankruptcy, no state needs to declare bankruptcy, and no state would.
